languages.text: "Не совсем, ваше сиятельство. Моя стража без устали давит рядовых саботажников по всей планете, но без уничтожения их гнезда это не принесет значимых результатов. Кто-то руководит оборванцами, которые гибнут в таких бессмысленных эскападах, как сегодняшняя. И этот "кто-то" может скрываться где угодно! А в вашем распоряжении — ресурсы и возможности, которых никогда не будет у меня. Один ваш корабль — несравненное подспорье для выслеживания преступников за пределами моего влияния".

traits.locale_text: "Ни в коем случае — для этого у меня хватает людей. Но прежде чем поймать бунтовщика, нужно найти его. Мои подданные давят рядовых саботажников по всей планете, {name}, и не приносят значимых результатов, поскольку до сих пор не смогли найти их гнездо. Надо отметить, сами организаторы не доверяют своим пешкам: смердами движет пропаганда и ложь, которыми их вдоволь снабжают агитаторы, однако кто стоит во главе бунта, тайна даже для них".

languages.text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. My wardens are crushing the lowly saboteurs across the planet relentlessly, {name}, but it will be for naught unless their nests are destroyed. Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal the likes of which I could never hope to possess! Your ship alone is an unequalled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."
languages.original_text: "Не совсем, ваше сиятельство. Моя стража без устали давит рядовых саботажников по всей планете, но без уничтожения их гнезда это не принесет значимых результатов. Кто-то руководит оборванцами, которые гибнут в таких бессмысленных эскападах, как сегодняшняя. И этот "кто-то" может скрываться где угодно! А в вашем распоряжении — ресурсы и возможности, которых никогда не будет у меня. Один ваш корабль — несравненное подспорье для выслеживания преступников за пределами моего влияния".

traits.locale_text: "Not at all — I have plenty of people to do that for me. But before one can catch a rebel, one must find them. It is clear that the organizers behind this do not trust their pawns: the peasants are driven by lies fed to them by propagandists, but even they do not know who stands at the head of this uprising."

"Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. My guards are crushing the lowly saboteurs across the planet relentlessly, {name}, but it will be for naught unless their nests are destroyed. Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal, the likes of which I could never hope to possess! Your ship alone is an unequaled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."

"Not at all — I have plenty of people to do that for me. But before one can catch a rebel, one must find them. It is clear that the organizers behind this do not trust their pawns: the peasants are driven by lies fed to them by propagandists, but even they do not know who stands at the head of this uprising."

Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal the likes of which I could never hope to possess! Your ship alone is an unequalled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."

"Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. My wardens are crushing the lowly saboteurs across the planet relentlessly, {name}, but it will be for naught unless their nests are destroyed. Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal the likes of which I could never hope to possess! Your ship alone is an unequalled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."

"Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. My wardens are crushing the lowly saboteurs across the planet relentlessly, {name}, but it will be for naught unless their nests are destroyed. Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal the likes of which I could never hope to possess! Your ship alone is an unequalled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."

languages.text: “并非完全如此，大人。我的守卫正在锲而不舍地粉碎那些职别较低的破坏者，{name}，但除非能彻底摧毁他们的老巢，否则这些努力将徒劳无功。某个人正在操纵那群四处流窜的流民，就像我们今天看到的那些人那样，而那个幕后黑手可能会躲藏在任何地方！您拥有我无法企及的资源与能力，可以处理这些问题！光是您的舰船，就是件无与伦比的宝贵资产，可以用来追踪在我的势力范围之外活动的罪犯。”
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. My wardens are crushing the lowly saboteurs across the planet relentlessly, {name}, but it will be for naught unless their nests are destroyed. Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal the likes of which I could never hope to possess! Your ship alone is an unequalled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."

traits.locale_text: “并非完全如此，大人。我的守卫正在锲而不舍地粉碎那些职别较低的破坏者，{name}，但除非能彻底摧毁他们的老巢，否则这些努力将徒劳无功。某个人正在操纵那群四处流窜的流民，就像我们今天看到的那些人那样，而那个幕后黑手可能会躲藏在任何地方！您拥有我无法企及的资源与能力，可以处理这些问题！光是您的舰船，就是件无与伦比的宝贵资产，可以用来追踪在我的势力范围之外活动的罪犯。”

languages.text: «No es del todo cierto, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Mis vigilantes están aplastando a esos saboteadores rastreros por todo el planeta, {name}, pero será todo en vano si no destruimos sus guaridas. Hay alguien controlando a la escoria que muere en insensateces como la de hoy, ¡y puede estar escondido en cualquier parte! ¡Usted tiene recursos y capacidades que yo nunca podré igualar! Su misma nave ya sería un recurso incomparable a la hora de dar con aquellos criminales que escapan a los límites de mi influencia».
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. My wardens are crushing the lowly saboteurs across the planet relentlessly, {name}, but it will be for naught unless their nests are destroyed. Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal the likes of which I could never hope to possess! Your ship alone is an unequalled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."

traits.locale_text: «No es del todo cierto, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Mis vigilantes están aplastando a esos saboteadores rastreros por todo el planeta, {name}, pero será todo en vano si no destruimos sus guaridas. Hay alguien controlando a la escoria que muere en insensateces como la de hoy, ¡y puede estar escondido en cualquier parte! ¡Usted tiene recursos y capacidades que yo nunca podré igualar! Su misma nave ya sería un recurso incomparable a la hora de dar con aquellos criminales que escapan a los límites de mi influencia».

languages.text: 「そういうわけではありません、陛下。私のワーデンが星のあちこちに仕掛けられた低劣な妨害工作を破壊しているところです、{name}様。しかしながら、奴らの巣を叩かない限りこの働きも水泡に帰してしまうことでしょう。何者かが、今日目撃したような軽挙妄動で死にゆく下層階級のクズを操っているだけでなく、あらゆる場所に潜んでいるやもしれないのです！私が望んでも手に入れられないような、自由に扱える資源と力を陛下はお持ちです！我が影響の及ばぬ国境を越えた犯罪者どもを追跡するのに有利をとれるのは、陛下の船をおいて他にありません」
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. My wardens are crushing the lowly saboteurs across the planet relentlessly, {name}, but it will be for naught unless their nests are destroyed. Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal the likes of which I could never hope to possess! Your ship alone is an unequalled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."

traits.locale_text: 「そういうわけではありません、陛下。私のワーデンが星のあちこちに仕掛けられた低劣な妨害工作を破壊しているところです、{name}様。しかしながら、奴らの巣を叩かない限りこの働きも水泡に帰してしまうことでしょう。何者かが、今日目撃したような軽挙妄動で死にゆく下層階級のクズを操っているだけでなく、あらゆる場所に潜んでいるやもしれないのです！私が望んでも手に入れられないような、自由に扱える資源と力を陛下はお持ちです！我が影響の及ばぬ国境を越えた犯罪者どもを追跡するのに有利をとれるのは、陛下の船をおいて他にありません」

languages.text: "Nicht ganz, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Meine Wächter bringen die Saboteure auf dem ganzen Planeten gnadenlos zur Strecke, {name}, aber das hilft nichts, solange wir ihre Nester nicht vernichten. Jemand befehligt das Gesindel, das bei sinnlosen Aktionen wie der heutigen ums Leben kommt, und dieser Jemand kann sich überall verstecken! Euch stehen Ressourcen und Möglichkeiten zur Verfügung, die ich mir niemals auch nur erhoffen dürfte! Euer Schiff allein wäre unvergleichlich, um Verbrecher jenseits meines Einflussbereichs zur Strecke zu bringen."
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. My wardens are crushing the lowly saboteurs across the planet relentlessly, {name}, but it will be for naught unless their nests are destroyed. Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal the likes of which I could never hope to possess! Your ship alone is an unequalled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht ganz, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Meine Wächter bringen die Saboteure auf dem ganzen Planeten gnadenlos zur Strecke, {name}, aber das hilft nichts, solange wir ihre Nester nicht vernichten. Jemand befehligt das Gesindel, das bei sinnlosen Aktionen wie der heutigen ums Leben kommt, und dieser Jemand kann sich überall verstecken! Euch stehen Ressourcen und Möglichkeiten zur Verfügung, die ich mir niemals auch nur erhoffen dürfte! Euer Schiff allein wäre unvergleichlich, um Verbrecher jenseits meines Einflussbereichs zur Strecke zu bringen."

languages.text: « Pas tout à fait, Votre Seigneurie. Mes gardiens écrasent sans relâche les saboteurs sur toute la planète, mais leurs efforts ne mèneront à rien tant que les nids de ces misérables n'auront pas été détruits. Quelqu'un contrôle la vermine qui se sacrifie dans des actes insensés comme celui dont nous avons été témoins aujourd'hui, et ce quelqu'un pourrait se cacher n'importe où ! {name}, vous avez à votre disposition des ressources et des capacités dont nous ne pourrions que rêver ! Votre vaisseau à lui seul représente un avantage inouï pour traquer les criminels au-delà de ma sphère d'influence. »
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. My wardens are crushing the lowly saboteurs across the planet relentlessly, {name}, but it will be for naught unless their nests are destroyed. Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal the likes of which I could never hope to possess! Your ship alone is an unequalled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."

traits.locale_text: « Pas tout à fait, Votre Seigneurie. Mes gardiens écrasent sans relâche les saboteurs sur toute la planète, mais leurs efforts ne mèneront à rien tant que les nids de ces misérables n'auront pas été détruits. Quelqu'un contrôle la vermine qui se sacrifie dans des actes insensés comme celui dont nous avons été témoins aujourd'hui, et ce quelqu'un pourrait se cacher n'importe où ! {name}, vous avez à votre disposition des ressources et des capacités dont nous ne pourrions que rêver ! Votre vaisseau à lui seul représente un avantage inouï pour traquer les criminels au-delà de ma sphère d'influence. »

languages.text: "Tam olarak öyle değil {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Dizdarlarım, gezegendeki aşağılık sabotajcıları acımasızca eziyor lakin yuvalarını yıkmadıkça çabaları nafile olacak {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. Birisi, bugün tanık olduğumuz gibi düşüncesiz eylemlerle canından olan bu süprüntüleri kontrol ediyor ve bu şahıs her yerde saklanıyor olabilir! Emrinizde, sahip olmayı umamayacağım türden kaynak ve kudret var! Geminiz bile tek başına nüfuzumun sınırları ötesindeki suçluları takip etmek için eşsiz bir araç."
languages.original_text: "Not quite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. My wardens are crushing the lowly saboteurs across the planet relentlessly, {name}, but it will be for naught unless their nests are destroyed. Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal the likes of which I could never hope to possess! Your ship alone is an unequalled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."

traits.locale_text: "Tam olarak öyle değil {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Muhafızlarım, gezegendeki aşağılık sabotajcıları acımasızca eziyor lakin yuvalarını yıkmadıkça çabaları nafile olacak. Birisi, bugün tanık olduğumuz gibi düşüncesiz hareketlerle canından olan bu süprüntüleri kontrol ediyor. Bu şahsın nerede saklandığını bilmiyoruz! Emrinizde, sahip olmayı umamayacağım türden kaynak ve kudret var! Geminiz bile tek başına nüfuzumun sınırları ötesindeki suçluları takip etmek için eşsiz bir araç."
